4) run command -> ssh -i file-name[private-key] root@ipv4  for logged in
5) for update everything ->apt update -- no need when run auto update
6) for upgrade things -> apt dist-upgrade ---- no need when run auto update
7) enabling auto upgrade -> dpkg-reconfigure --priority-low unattended-upgrades

timedatectl set-timezone "Asia/Dhaka"

9)create a user
useradd -m -p $(openssl passwd -1 "$PASSWORD") -s /bin/bash -G sudo "$USERNAME" ( Example - adduser mohit043)

10) i want to see home directory of new user - run cd /home then run ll

11) to do some adminstartion work -- run usermod -aG sudo mohit043

12) check sudo groups -- run groups

13) make new user logged in to your server then make directory -- mkdir .ssh
